awards.title: Best School Uniform Design
awards.description: Recognized for innovative and comfortable uniform designs that combine style with practicality.

awards.title: Sustainable Manufacturing Award
awards.description: Awarded for our commitment to producing high-quality school uniforms using eco-friendly practices and sustainable materials.

awards.title: Quality Excellence Award
awards.description: Recognized for maintaining exceptional quality standards in uniform manufacturing and customer satisfaction.

awards.title: Customer Service Excellence
awards.description: Awarded for outstanding customer service and support in the school uniform industry.
